entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Beauceville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:35 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow or ice pellets. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning then changing to ice pellets this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to freezing rain this evening then to rain before morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
